text: foreign
is one of the largest media houses on
Czech Market focusing mainly on business
use but we also have a large online part
with more than 5 million users coming to
our products every month economy is
traditional media house so we also had
traditional on-prem infrastructure the
main challenges we were trying to solve
were all The Usual Suspects of on-prem
infrastructure slow Hardware
provisioning really painful adoption of
new technologies and not only adoption
but also operation of these Technologies
so in our case it was more about
migrating part of our online
infrastructure to do Cloud but when we
are building new products we are
building them natively for AWS AWS was a
natural choice for us we were aiming for
flexibility agility to be able to move
faster to be able to do true devops to
have infrastructure as a code we can
really build infrastructure as a code
environment we can test new technologies
in you know minutes or days instead of
months and has tremendous impact to what
we are doing AWS also allowed us to test
these new technologies without worrying
that much about capex and the
maintenance costs when we are moving our
products to AWS or building new ones
Cloud native we always think about what
we can use what of the products or
Services AWS is offering that we can use
and get the most benefit of in our case
we are using lambdas a lot for building
our serverless infrastructure and
dynamodb for storing a lot of user data
we are not limiting ourselves to one
particular use case it has to make sense
for us from course point of view but
also it has to give us the flexibility
agility all the things we are looking
for now we have around 20 to 30 30
percent of our infrastructure on AWS and
we are hoping to get to 50 till end of
this year AWS shows its full potential
its magic when you really design your in
your infrastructure application from the
ground to be Cloud native and you use
all the features and services AWS can
offer you and then it unlocks the full
potential of your ID development to give
you the best flexibility agility and the
speed you want you need to deliver the
best product to your customers
thank you
thank you
